import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { motion } from "framer-motion" const Cart = ({ cart, addToCart, removeFromCart, totalCost, decreaseQuantity }) => { return (
{cart.length === 0 &&

quantity

} ) } export default Cart
